name: Hover
description: Experience the thrills of a fast-paced single and multiplayer Parkour game. Join the Rebellion and deride the security forces of an anti-leisure tyranny. Rise up to the many challenges of a futuristic Open World. Assemble your team, enhance your gear and perform incredible tricks and combos.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 8.1 64-bit Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4130 @3.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 / AMD Radeon™ HD 6870 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
